name: Curve cvxCRV Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains CRV, Curve's native governance token, and cvxCRV, Convex's tradable version of vote-escrowed CRV (veCRV).

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains CRV, Curve's native governance token, and cvxCRV, Convex's tradable version of vote-escrowed CRV (veCRV).

fr.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains CRV, Curve's native governance token, and cvxCRV, Convex's tradable version of vote-escrowed CRV (veCRV).

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene CRV, el token de gobierno nativo de Curve, y cvxCRV, la versión negociable de Convex del CRV con depósito de votos (veCRV).

de.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains CRV, Curve's native governance token, and cvxCRV, Convex's tradable version of vote-escrowed CRV (veCRV).

This pool contains CRV, Curve's native governance token, and cvxCRV, Convex's tradable version of vote-escrowed CRV (veCRV).

el.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains CRV, Curve's native governance token, and cvxCRV, Convex's tradable version of vote-escrowed CRV (veCRV).

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu havuz, Curve'nin yerel yönetim belirteci olan CRV'yi ve Convex'in oy ile emanet edilen CRV'nin (veCRV) takas edilebilir sürümü olan cvxCRV'yi içerir.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains CRV, Curve's native governance token, and cvxCRV, Convex's tradable version of vote-escrowed CRV (veCRV).

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 Curve 的原生治理代币 CRV 和由 Convex 发行的可交易版本的 veCRV 即 cvxCRV。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में जमा कर सकते हैं। इस पूल में CRV, Curve का नेटिव गवर्नेंस टोकन, और cvxCRV, Convex का वोट-एस्क्रोड CRV (veCRV) का ट्रेडेबल वर्जन है।
